name: Gypsy Queen Soldered Vintage Belt Buckle
description:
Love this Buckle!  This is a vintage grey metal belt buckle that I have embellished by soldering a crown and hand stamping "Gypsy Queen" onto it.  There is rhinestones rimming the buckle.  I have added a patina to everything for that rustic look.  The buckle measures 3 1/2" x 2 1/2".  And fits belts up to 1 3/4".

Note this is just the belt buckle.  I do not carry belts in my shop yet, but I know that you can purchase snap belts online or at locat department stores.

name: "Live, Laugh, Love" Pink Rhinestone Leather Cuff Bracelet
description:
Leather cuff made from upcycled belt available in custom sizes. All cuffs have a handstamped metal tag that can be personalized with any words you choose, this particular one I stamped "live, laugh, love", and added pink rhinestone rivets to the cuff.

To attach the cuff I have chosen a heavy duty metal snap.

Cuffs are available in brown or black leather and stamping tag is available in shiny silver or antiqued bronze. You can view my other items in my shop to see what stamping tags I have available.  You can also change the ribbon to any color you like.

All my cuffs are custom sized so include in the message section your wrist measurement and I add 1 1/2" or 1 3/4" to allow for snap and comfort. I go with the smaller if you like a snug fit, the larger if you like it looser.

name: "Lucky Mom" Leather Cuff Bracelet
description:
Leather cuff made from upcycled belt available in custom sizes. All cuffs have a handstamped metal tag that can be personalized with any words you choose, this particular one I stamped "lucky mom" with hearts outlining the tag and attached a handstamped ribbon. 

To attach the cuff I have chosen a heavy duty metal snap.

Cuffs can be customized with your favorite color ribbon. 

Cuffs are available in brown or black leather and stamping tag is available in a variety of finishes. You can view my other items in my shop to see what stamping tags I have available.

All my cuffs are custom sized so include in the message section your wrist measurement and I add 1 1/2" or 1 3/4" to allow for snap and comfort. I go with the smaller if you like a snug fit, the larger if you like it looser.

name: "Daddy Rocks" Leather Cuff Bracelet
description:
Leather cuff made from upcycled belt available in custom sizes. Cuffs have a handstamped metal tag that can be personalized with any words you choose, this particular one I made for my husband and stamped "daddy rocks" and personalized it with our kids names. You may choose your own word, quote or names. To attach the cuff I have chosen a heavy duty metal snap.

Cuffs are available in brown or black leather and stamping tag is available in shiny silver or vintage bronze. You can view my other items in my shop to see what stamping tags I have available.

All my cuffs are custom sized so include in the message section your wrist measurement and I add 1 3/4" to allow for snap and comfort.
